Dialog: I noticed your walls are looking a little bare, so I got you this poster! Thanks for making such great coffee!
You're doing such a great job! I grew this plant in my garden and I think it would look great in your shop if you want it!
Did you hear? It's national COFFEE day!! How exciting, I bet you'll have a ton of customers today!

Hey, I have some extra paint. Each can is the perfect amount for your walls. If you pick one of these colors, I can paint up the walls for you! Your coffee has helped me through all my hardest workdays ;)
Wow, your shop is busy these days. I'm a carpenter, so let me make you a few more tables. As a thanks for making the best coffee in town!
Your coffee is soooo tasty! I think you could be really good at making matcha drinks too. Here, have my machine, I don't use it enough.
This is my favorite cafe! I made this art for you and you can put it up if you want.
Hello I see that the last two tables I made for you are getting a lot of use! Let me make you a couple more. Keep up the good work!
Have you heard of this amaaaazing drink called Boba? I think you would be good at making it! Here's a boba machine to help you get started!
Hi! I saw that you like plants and I have this fiddle leaf fig tree that I can't take care of anymore. I want you to have it!
Guess what?! It's national DRINK day! I hope it goes well for you today, all your drinks are so tasty!
